attributes.review: I have never been more disappointed by an app. I thought I was going to get a fun gaming experience based on all the radical cooky adds and trailers of the game where it shows you get to play an orangutan whoâ€™s secret passion is being a clown. Instead all I got to see was a mean man who is sexist bigoted and racist. Iâ€™m sincerely disappointed in the fact that the trailers didnâ€™t match game play. If I wanted to play a survival game where a country is falling apart a wouldâ€™ve downloaded a zombie survival game or plague inc. If I could give this a zero star review I would please remove it from the App Store.
